name: Fat Brain Toys
description: Fat Brain Toys is a leading retailer and manufacturer of innovative and educational toys for children. Founded in 2002, the company is committed to providing high-quality products that promote creativity, learning, and play. With a focus on STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) education, Fat Brain Toys offers a wide range of toys that cater to different age groups and developmental needs. The company's product line includes puzzles, games, building sets, and sensory toys, all designed to inspire curiosity and facilitate hands-on learning. Fat Brain Toys is recognized for its dedication to safety and quality, ensuring that all products meet stringent safety standards. With a mission to create joyful learning experiences, Fat Brain Toys strives to make playtime both fun and educational for children around the world. The company also emphasizes customer satisfaction, providing excellent service and a user-friendly shopping experience through its online platform. As a trusted name in the toy industry, Fat Brain Toys continues to expand its product offerings while advocating for the importance of play in child development.

seo.meta_title: Fat Brain Toys | Innovative Educational Toys for Children
seo.meta_description: Explore Fat Brain Toys, the leading provider of innovative and educational toys that promote creativity and STEM learning for children.

faq.question: What types of products does Fat Brain Toys offer?
faq.answer: Fat Brain Toys offers a variety of innovative and educational toys, including STEM toys, puzzles, and sensory items.

faq.question: Where is Fat Brain Toys headquartered?
faq.answer: Fat Brain Toys is headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, USA.

faq.question: When was Fat Brain Toys founded?
faq.answer: Fat Brain Toys was founded in 2002.

faq.question: What is the mission of Fat Brain Toys?
faq.answer: The mission of Fat Brain Toys is to create joyful learning experiences through innovative and educational toys.
